Other pages for this artwork cycle: 
=== Finding your inner Koala ===

If you search amongst the Eucalyptus you will find the Karmic Koala, as your data condenses from the cloud, like perls of wisdom, then falls into the pool of shared knowledge, rippling through the community.

=== Concept ===

"A good Koala knows how to see the wood for the trees, even when her head
is in the clouds... A savvy Koala knows that the best way to conserve energy...."

Green is the most logical choice of colour for anything relating to energy conservation.

The artwork will embody these ideas and a sense of calm and sophistication that reflects the maturation of Ubuntu.
